QuestData.Title: Secret Strength of the Frenzyheart
QuestData.Description: Battle still going at Kartak hold... I think it time for you to learn big secret of Frenzyheart.$B$BWe have berries we keep from other lands we came from... they not so special on their own, but mix them with drunk drinks and they make Frenzyheart super strong. You a Frenzyheart now... it time you get to be strong too.$B$BI give some drink, then you be super strong and you go smash all the spark big-tongues.
QuestData.LogDescription: Using the secret Frenzyheart drink, slaughter 30 of the Sparktouched Gorlocs around Kartak's Hold.
QuestData.CompletionText: Vekgar teach you super secret, eh? Only strongest Frenzyheart get to know secret.
QuestData.RewardText: You a fierce fighter... come back for more battle soon. Never enough good battle!
